trans-unit.source: Allows programmatic access to the HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<select>" name="<select>" href=""></xref> element on the server.
trans-unit.target: Tillater programmatisk tilgang til HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<select>" name="<select>" href=""> </xref> element på serveren.

trans-unit.source: Use the HtmlSelect control to create a selection box.
trans-unit.target: Bruk HtmlSelect kontrollen til å opprette en valget for.

trans-unit.source: Specify item listings in the control by placing HTML `<option>` elements between the opening and closing `<select>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Angir elementet oppføringer i kontrollen ved å sette HTML `<option>` elementer mellom innledende og avsluttende `<select>` koder.

trans-unit.source: Each item is represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: Hvert element som er representert av en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem?displayProperty=fullName>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To specify the text that is displayed for each item in the control, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the item, or simply place text between the opening and closing `<option>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en tekst som vises for hvert element i kontrollen, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for elementet eller ganske enkelt sted teksten mellom innledende og avsluttende `<option>` koder.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: By setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the item, you can associate a value with the item that is different from the text.
trans-unit.target: Ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen for elementet du kan knytte en verdi til elementet som er forskjellig fra teksten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To select an item from the list by default, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the item to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Velg et element fra listen som standard, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for elementet som `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can control the appearance and behavior of the HtmlSelect control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kontrollere utseendet og virkemåten kontrollens HtmlSelect ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property specifies the height (in rows) of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>egenskapen angir høyden (i rader) kontrollens.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property specifies whether more than one item can be concurrently selected in the HtmlSelect control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>egenskapen angir om mer enn ett element kan velges samtidig HtmlSelect kontrollens.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the HtmlSelect control is displayed as a drop-down list box.
trans-unit.target: Som standard vises HtmlSelect kontrollen som en liste fra rullegardinlisten.

trans-unit.source: If you allow multiple selections (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du tillater flere valg (ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>egenskapen `true`), eller angi en høyde som er større enn én rad (ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>til en verdi som er større enn `1`), kontrollen skal vises som en liste.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the selected item in a single-selection HtmlSelect control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property to get the index of the selected item.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å finne det valgte elementet i en enkel merking HtmlSelect kontroll av <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>til å hente indeksen for det valgte elementet.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then use this value to retrieve the item from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter bruke denne verdien til å hente elementet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the selected items from an HtmlSelect control that allows multiple selections, iterate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection and test the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of each item.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil finne ut de valgte elementene fra en kontroll som HtmlSelect som tillater flere valg, kan du gå gjennom den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>samlingen og test av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for hvert element.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: The HtmlSelect class provides two properties to support data binding.
trans-unit.target: Klassen HtmlSelect inneholder to egenskaper for å støtte databinding.

trans-unit.source: To bind data to any object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName> interface (such as <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName>), or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property to specify the data source to bind to.
trans-unit.target: Binde data til et objekt som implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnittet (eksempel <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>, og <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName>), eller <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>grensesnitt ved å bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>til å angi skal bindes til datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property, you must manually write the code to perform the data binding.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>-egenskapen, må du manuelt skrive kode for å utføre databindingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: To automatically bind an HtmlSelect control to a data source represented by a data source control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property and set its value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the data source control to use.
trans-unit.target: For å automatisk binde en kontroll som HtmlSelect til en datakilde som er representert av en datakildekontroll, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>egenskapen og setter den til den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>datakilde kontrollen skal brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property, the HtmlSelect control automatically binds to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>egenskapen HtmlSelect kontrollen automatisk binder seg til den angitte datakildekontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you do not need to explicitly call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Derfor trenger du ikke eksplisitt kalle den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also specify which fields in the data source bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties of an item in the control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi hvilke felt i datakilden bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapene til et element i kontrollen ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A>Egenskaper henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple sources of data, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> property to specify the specific source to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis datakilden inneholder flere datakilder, bruker du <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>til å angi bestemte kilden som skal bindes til kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName> object with multiple tables, you must specify which table to bind to the control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du for eksempel en <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>objekt med flere tabeller, må du angi hvilken tabell som skal bindes til kontrollen med den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of HtmlSelect, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av HtmlSelect, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å opprette og starte en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdien for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>|The "select" literal string.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>| "Velg" strenglitteral. |</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adds a parsed child control to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en analysere underordnede kontrollen i <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The AddParsedSubObject method is used by ASP.NET to add parsed child controls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden AddParsedSubObject brukes av ASP.NET til å legge til analysere underordnede kontroller til den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The parsed child control to add.
trans-unit.target: Analysere underordnede kontrollen å legge til.

trans-unit.source: The child control specified by the obj parameter must be of the type .
trans-unit.target: Den underordnede kontrollen som er angitt av den obj parameteren må være av typen .

trans-unit.source: Clears the list selection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control and sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of all items to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner listevalg for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontroll og angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> for alle elementer til <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ClearSelection method iterates through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> collection represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> property and sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A> property of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> object to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ClearSelection går gjennom den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection>samlingen representert av den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>egenskapen og angir de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A>for hver <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>objekt `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection"></xref> object for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection"> </xref> objekt den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control does not allow child controls.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollen tillater ikke underordnede kontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> to contain the current server control's child server controls.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> skal inneholde serverkontroller for den gjeldende serverkontroll underordnede.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the set of data to bind to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control from a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource*> property with multiple sets of data.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir settet med data som skal bindes til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollere fra en <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource*>egenskap med flere datasett.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property contains multiple sets of data, use the DataMember property to specify which set of data to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>egenskapen inneholder flere datasett, bruke egenskapen DataMember til å angi hvilke data skal bindes til kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName> object with multiple tables, use this property to indicate which table to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du for eksempel en <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>objekt med flere tabeller, brukes denne egenskapen til å angi hvilken tabell som skal bindes til kontrollen.</xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: After you have specified the data source to bind to the control, you can then specify which fields from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties of each item in the control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Når du har angitt datakilden som skal bindes til kontrollen, kan du deretter angi som felt fra datakilden som skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Egenskaper for hvert element i kontrollen ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A>Egenskaper henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The set of data to bind to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control from a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource*> with multiple sets of data.
trans-unit.target: Settet med data som skal bindes til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollere fra en <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource*>med flere datasett.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), which indicates the property has not been set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng (""), noe som angir egenskapen er ikke angitt.

trans-unit.source: The DataMember property is set during the data-binding phase of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DataMember er angitt i databinding fasen av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the source of information to bind to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kilden for informasjon som skal bindes til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataSource property to specify the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk DataSource-egenskapen til å angi datakilden som skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: A data source must be a collection that implements either the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName> interface (such as <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName>) or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: En datakilde må være en samling som implementerer enten den <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnittet (eksempel <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>, eller <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName>) eller <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>grensesnittet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you set the DataSource property, you must manually write the code to perform data binding.
trans-unit.target: Når du har angitt egenskapen DataSource, skriver du må manuelt koden for å utføre databinding.

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple sets of data, such as a <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName> object with multiple tables, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> property to specify which data set to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis datakilden inneholder flere datasett, for eksempel en <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>objekt med flere tabeller, bruker du den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>til å angi hvilken datasettet skal bindes til kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can specify which fields from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties of each item in the control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi som felt fra datakilden som skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Egenskaper for hvert element i kontrollen ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A>Egenskaper henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Alternately, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property to automatically bind to a data source represented by a data source control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>egenskapen automatisk binde til en datakilde som er representert av en datakilde-kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property, the data listing control automatically binds to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>egenskapen dataene opplisting kontrollen automatisk binder seg til den angitte datakildekontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du trenger ikke å skrive kode som eksplisitt kall av <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>metode.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: If values are specified for both the DataSource property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property, ASP.NET is not able to resolve the data source and a <xref:System.Web.HttpException?displayProperty=fullName> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdiene er angitt for både egenskapen DataSource og <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>egenskapen ASP.NET kan ikke løse datakilden, og en <xref:System.Web.HttpException?displayProperty=fullName>unntak.</xref:System.Web.HttpException?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> or <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource"></xref> that contains a collection of values used to supply data to this control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>eller <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource"> </xref> som inneholder en samling av verdiene som brukes til å angi data til denne kontrollen.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified data source is not compatible with either <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource"></xref>, and it is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte datakilden er ikke kompatibel med enten <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName> eller <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource"> </xref>, og det er ikke <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The data source cannot be resolved because a value is specified for both the DataSource property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID*> property.
trans-unit.target: Datakilden kan ikke løses fordi en verdi er angitt for både egenskapen DataSource og <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*> property of the data source control that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control should use to retrieve its data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*>for datakilden kontrollere som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen skal bruke til å hente datakilde.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*>

trans-unit.source: Use the DataSourceID property to set or access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the data source control that the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control should use to retrieve its data source.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen DataSourceID angi eller få tilgang til den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>for datakilden kontrollere som den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollen skal bruke til å hente datakilde.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data source control referenced by the DataSourceID property can be any control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: Datakilde-kontroll ble referert av DataSourceID kan ha en kontroll som implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The data source control must exist either in the same naming container as the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control that references it or in a parent control of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Datakilde-kontrollen må finnes i samme naming beholderen som den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollen som refererer til den eller i en overordnet kontroll av den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value for this property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control automatically binds to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir en verdi for denne egenskapen i <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollen automatisk binder seg til den angitte datakildekontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method.

trans-unit.source: Alternately, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property to specify the source of values to bind to an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.

trans-unit.source: The data source must be a collection that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName> interface (such as <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName>) or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> class provides two properties for specifying the data source to bind to.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property allows you to bind an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to any collection that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource?displayProperty=fullName> interfaces (such as <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName>).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property allows you to bind an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to a data source control that represents a data source.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control requires data binding and that a valid data source control is specified before calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind*> method.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer at det <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> krever databinding, og som er angitt en ugyldig datakildekontroll før du kaller den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind*>

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property, ASP.NET automatically binds the data listing control to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir en verdi for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>egenskapen ASP.NET binding automatisk dataene opplisting kontrollen til den angitte datakildekontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: When ASP.NET performs data binding for the control, it calls the EnsureDataBound method first to verify that the control has not already been data-bound and that a valid data source control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface is specified for its <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når ASP.NET utfører databinding for kontrollen, kaller metoden EnsureDataBound først for å bekrefte at kontrollen ikke allerede er bundet til data og at en gyldig datakilde kontrollere som implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>grensesnitt er angitt den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The EnsureDataBound method then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method to ensure that the control is data-bound immediately after the call to this method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden EnsureDataBound kaller deretter den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>metode for å sikre at kontrollen er bundet til data umiddelbart etter kall til denne metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> object that represents the data source that is bound to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>objektet som representerer datakilden som er bundet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The GetData method returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> object independent of whether the data source was specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: GetData-metoden returnerer en <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>objektet uavhengig av om datakilden ble angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>egenskapen eller <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>objektet.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content between the opening and closing tags of the control with automatic conversion of special characters to their equivalent HTML entities.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir innhold mellom innledende og avsluttende koder kontrollens med automatisk konvertering av spesialtegn til de tilsvarende HTML-enhetene.

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported for this control.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen støttes ikke for denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The content between the opening and closing tags of the control.
trans-unit.target: Innhold mellom innledende og avsluttende koder i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to read from or assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte er å lese fra eller tilordne en verdi for denne egenskapen oppgitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID*> property is defined for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om en <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID*>er definert den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID*>

trans-unit.source: If the length of the string representing the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property string is greater than zero, then IsBoundUsingDataSourceID returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis lengden på strengen som representerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>egenskapsstreng er større enn null og IsBoundUsingDataSourceID returnerer `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a data source control is defined; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en datakilde er definert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains the items listed in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling som inneholder elementer som er oppført i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the Items collection to manage the items listed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av elementsamlingen til å behandle elementer som er oppført i den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically add items to, remove items from, and insert items into the collection.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til elementer for å fjerne elementer i, og sett elementer i samlingen programmatisk.

trans-unit.source: The Items collection is commonly used to iterate through the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Elementsamlingen brukes vanligvis til å gå gjennom elementene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: For example, when multiple items are selected, you can iterate through the Items collection to determine which items are selected.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel når flere elementer er merket, kan du gå gjennom elementsamlingen til å fastslå hvilke elementer er valgt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection"></xref> that contains the items listed in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection"> </xref> som inneholder elementer som er oppført i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Processes the postback data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Behandler sende tilbake dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The LoadPostData method checks whether the postback data of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control is different from its previous value, and if so, returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: LoadPostData metoden kontrollerer om sende tilbake dataene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollen er forskjellig fra den forrige verdien, og i så fall returnerer `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property is `false`, indicating a single-selection <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control, then the LoadPostData method checks the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>egenskapen `false`, som angir en enkel merking <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollen, og deretter LoadPostData metoden sjekker den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property is `true`, indicating a multiple-selection <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control, then the LoadPostData method checks the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>egenskapen `true`, som angir en sammensatt merking <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollen, og deretter LoadPostData metoden sjekker den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The LoadPostData method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden LoadPostData brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere utvide funksjonaliteten til de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen identifikatoren for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The collection of all incoming name values.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen av alle navneverdier som innkommende.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control's state has changed as a result of a postback; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollens tilstanden er endret som et resultat av en tilbakesending; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex*> property was set to a value greater than the number of items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control or less than <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex*>-egenskap er satt til en verdi større enn antallet elementer i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen eller mindre enn <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Restores the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control's view state information from a previous page request that was saved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState*> method.
trans-unit.target: Gjenoppretter den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollens visningen statusinformasjon fra forrige side forespørselen som ble lagret i den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState*>

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av .NET Framework-infrastruktur og skal ikke brukes direkte fra koden.

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollutviklere kan imidlertid overstyre denne metoden hvis du vil angi hvordan en egendefinert serverkontroll gjenoppretter visningstilstanden.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ASP.NET oversikt over tilstand](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's view state is stored as a <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollens visningsstatus lagres som et <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's base view state.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First>felt for den <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>objekt inneholder den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollens base visningsstatus.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> collection represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second>felt for den <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>objekt inneholder den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection>samlingen representert av den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the selected indices represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third>felt for den <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>objektet inneholder valgte indekser representert av den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third>

trans-unit.source: The LoadViewState method calls the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to restore the control's base view state.
trans-unit.target: Metoden LoadViewState kaller basisklassen <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å gjenopprette kontrollens base visningsstatus.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The LoadViewState method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden LoadViewState brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere utvide funksjonaliteten til de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the control state to be restored.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer tilstanden kontrollen skal gjenopprettes.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether multiple items can be selected concurrently in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om flere elementer kan velges samtidig i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the Multiple property to specify whether multiple items can be concurrently selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av flere-egenskapen til å angi om flere elementer kan velges samtidig i den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control is displayed as a drop-down list box.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollen skal vises som en rullegardinliste.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: If you allow multiple selections (by setting the Multiple property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du tillater flere valg (ved å sette egenskapen flere til `true`), eller angi en høyde som er større enn én rad (ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>til en verdi som er større enn `1`), kontrollen skal vises som en liste.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the selected items in an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control that allows multiple simultaneous selections, iterate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection and test the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of each item.
trans-unit.target: Å finne ut de valgte elementene i en <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollen som tillater flere samtidige valg gå gjennom den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>samlingen og test av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for hvert element.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `multiple` attribute is rendered in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control only if this property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den `multiple` attributtet gjengis i den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollerer bare hvis denne egenskapen settes til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if multiple items can be concurrently selected in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis flere elementer kan velges samtidig i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollere; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unique identifier name associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på Unik identifikator tilknyttet det <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the Name property to determine the unique identifier name for an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk Name-egenskapen til å fastslå navnet Unik identifikator for en <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: In this implementation, the `get` accessor returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: I denne implementeringen av `get` aksessor returnerer verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: However, the `set` accessor does not assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid den `set` aksessor ikke tilordne en verdi for denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `set` accessor does not assign a value to this property because the Name property must have the same value as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to work properly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den `set` aksessor ikke tilordne en verdi for denne egenskapen fordi Name-egenskapen må ha samme verdi som den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollen skal fungere på riktig måte.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier name associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på Unik identifikator tilknyttet det <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding"></xref> event of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding"> </xref> hendelse for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding> event is raised when data is bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>denne hendelsen oppstår når data er bundet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>

trans-unit.source: This method notifies the control to perform any data-binding logic that is associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden varsler kontrollen til å utføre noen databinding logic som er knyttet til den.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the OnDataBinding method creates the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection from the data source specified in either the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Nærmere bestemt metoden OnDataBinding oppretter den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>samlingen fra datakilden som er angitt i noen av <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>egenskapen eller <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnDataBinding method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnDataBinding kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> som inneholder Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: The OnDataPropertyChanged method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `true` if the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property has changed.
