trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref> event for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"> </xref> hendelse for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The OnInit method notifies the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnInit varsler den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollen å utføre initialisering trinn som kreves for å opprette og konfigurere en forekomst.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A> property is `false` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsPostBack%2A> property is `true`, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A>egenskapen `false` og <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsPostBack%2A>egenskapen `true`, vil <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsPostBack%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> som inneholder Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Load"></xref> event for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Load"> </xref> hendelse for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The OnLoad method notifies the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control that it should perform actions common to each HTTP request for the page it is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnLoad varsler den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollerer at det må utføre handlinger som er felles for hver HTTP-forespørsel for siden den er knyttet til.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The OnLoad method connects the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to the appropriate data source specified in either the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnLoad kobler den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollen til den aktuelle datakilden som er angitt i noen av <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>egenskapen eller <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property is to specify the data source control that the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control should use to retrieve its data source, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> method is set as the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>egenskapen, er å angi datakilden kontrollere som den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollen skal bruke til å hente datakilde, og deretter den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A>metoden som er angitt som hendelsesbehandlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> som inneholder Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"> </xref> hendelse for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property is greater than 1, then the OnPreRender method registers the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> control as one that requires postback processing.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>egenskapen er større enn 1 og metoden OnPreRender registrerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>styre med den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>kontrollen som en som krever sende tilbake behandling.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange"> </xref> hendelse av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a custom handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg angi et egendefinert behandlingsprogram for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> event is raised when the selected items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control change between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange>denne hendelsen oppstår når de valgte elementene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollen endring mellom legges til serveren.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This event is raised only when the user initiates a post to the server, such as by clicking a Submit button.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne hendelsen oppstår når brukeren starter en post til serveren som ved å klikke Send-knappen.

trans-unit.source: This event does not cause a post to the server to occur.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen fører ikke til en post til serveren for å oppstå.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The control must have view state enabled for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> event to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Kontrollen må ha visningsstatus aktivert for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange>hendelsen skal fungere riktig.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform data validation on the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control when the user changes the selection in the control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne hendelsen til å utføre validering av data på den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollerer når brukeren endrer valget i kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnServerChange method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnServerChange kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> som inneholder Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange*> method to signal the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control that the state of the control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Kall den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange*>metoden signalisere den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen tilstanden til kontrollen er endret.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange*>

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostDataChangedEvent method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RaisePostDataChangedEvent brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere utvide funksjonaliteten til de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control's attributes to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelser av <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollens attributtene til den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The RenderAttributes method renders the `name` attribute of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control directly to ensure that it has the same value as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RenderAttributes gjengir den `name` for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollen direkte for å sikre at den har samme verdi som den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: After rendering the attribute, the RenderAttributes method calls the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.RenderAttributes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Etter gjengivelse attributtet, kaller metoden RenderAttributes basisklassen <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.RenderAttributes%2A>metode.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.RenderAttributes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RenderAttributes method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RenderAttributes brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere utvide funksjonaliteten til de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the rendered content.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som mottar gjengitte innholdet.

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control's child controls to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelser av <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollens underordnede kontroller til den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The RenderChildren method overrides the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A> method without calling the base method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RenderChildren overstyrer basisklassen <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A>metoden uten å kalle metoden base.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each of the `<option>` elements between the opening and closing `<select>` tags is rendered with a `value` attribute, a `selected` attribute if the item is selected, and its associated text.
trans-unit.target: Hver av de `<option>` elementer mellom innledende og avsluttende `<select>` koder gjengis med en `value` attributtet en `selected` attributtet hvis elementet er valgt, og den tilhørende teksten.

trans-unit.source: If multiple items were selected but the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property is set to `false`, then an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis flere elementer ble merket men <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>er satt til `false`, og deretter en <xref:System.Web.HttpException>unntak.</xref:System.Web.HttpException> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the rendered content.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som mottar gjengitte innholdet.

trans-unit.source: Multiple items were selected but the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Flere elementer ble merket men <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple*>er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control needs to bind to its specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen skal bindes til den angitte datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control uses the RequiresDataBinding property to determine whether the control needs to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method to bind to its specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollen bruker RequiresDataBinding-egenskapen til å bestemme om kontrollen skal kalle den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>metoden skal bindes til den angitte datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: Each time the `set` accessor is called on either the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> property to change the data source after the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit%2A> method has already been called, ASP.NET automatically sets the value of the RequiresDataBinding property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hver gang de `set` aksessor kalles på en av <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>til å endre datakilden etter den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit%2A>har allerede blitt kalt, ASP.NET angir automatisk verdien for egenskapen RequiresDataBinding til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the RequiresDataBinding property is also set to `true` when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A> method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen RequiresDataBinding også settes til `true` når den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A>metoden aktiveres.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET automatically sets the value of the RequiresDataBinding property to `false` immediately after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method has been called.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET angir automatisk verdien for egenskapen RequiresDataBinding til `false` rett etter den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>har blitt kalt.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control needs to bind to a data source; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen skal bindes til datakilden. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Saves any <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control view state changes that have occurred since the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer noen <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen visningen tilstand endringer som har forekommet siden siden ble posteres tilbake til serveren.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's view state is stored as a <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollens visningsstatus lagres som et <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's base view state.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First>felt for den <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>objekt inneholder den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollens base visningsstatus.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> collection represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second>felt for den <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>objekt inneholder den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection>samlingen representert av den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the selected indices represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third>felt for den <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>objektet inneholder valgte indekser representert av den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> </xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third>

trans-unit.source: The SaveViewState method calls the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to save the control's base view state.
trans-unit.target: Metoden SaveViewState kaller basisklassen <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å lagre kontrollens base visningsstatus.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The SaveViewState method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden SaveViewState brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere utvide funksjonaliteten til de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that contains the changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> view state.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>som inneholder endringer i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> vise tilstand.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If no view state is associated with the object, this method returns a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen visningsstatus er knyttet til objektet, denne metoden returnerer en nullreferanse (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Selects multiple items of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items*> collection.
trans-unit.target: Velger flere elementer i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items*>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items*>

trans-unit.source: The Select method selects multiple items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Velg metoden velger flere elementer i den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Array> of type <xref:System.Int32> that contains the items to select.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Array>av typen <xref:System.Int32>som inneholder elementer å velge.</xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ordinal index of the selected item in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir ordensindeksen for det valgte elementet i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedIndex property is commonly used to determine the index of the selected item in a single-selection <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SelectedIndex brukes vanligvis til å fastsette indeksen for det valgte elementet i en enkel merking <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: This index can then be used to retrieve the item from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Denne indeksen kan deretter brukes til å hente elementet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property is set to `true`, indicating that multiple items can be concurrently selected, the SelectedIndex property contains the index of the first selected item.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>er satt til `true`, indikerer at flere elementer kan velges samtidig, egenskapen SelectedIndex inneholder indeksen for det valgte elementet første.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the selected items from an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control that allows multiple simultaneous selections, iterate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection and test the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of each item.
trans-unit.target: Å finne ut de valgte elementene fra en <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollen som tillater flere samtidige valg gå gjennom den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>samlingen og test av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for hvert element.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > It is possible to have no item selected.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Det er mulig å ha valgt element.

trans-unit.source: If no item is selected, the SelectedIndex property contains a value of `-1`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen elementer er merket, egenskapen SelectedIndex inneholder verdien `-1`.

trans-unit.source: This commonly occurs when the page first loads and an item is not selected by default.
trans-unit.target: Dette skjer vanligvis når siden først lastes inn og et element ikke er valgt som standard.

trans-unit.source: Provide code to test this value before referencing the item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Angi koden for å teste denne verdien før refererer til elementet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, an exception is thrown if the index is out of the range of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Ellers unntak et Hvis indeksen er utenfor området for samlingen.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control is displayed as a drop-down list box.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollen skal vises som en rullegardinliste.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: If you allow multiple selections (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du tillater flere valg (ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>egenskapen `true`), eller angi en høyde som er større enn én rad (ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>til en verdi som er større enn `1`), kontrollen skal vises som en liste.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a drop-down list box is displayed, an item is always selected.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det vises en liste fra rullegardinlisten, er alltid et element valgt.

trans-unit.source: If a list box is displayed, you can programmatically clear the selection from all items by setting the SelectedIndex property to `-1`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det vises en liste, programmatisk fjerner du merkingen fra alle elementer ved å sette egenskapen SelectedIndex til `-1`.

trans-unit.source: The ordinal index of the selected item in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ordensindeksen for det valgte elementet i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""></xref> indicates that no item is selected.
trans-unit.target: Verdien <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""> </xref> angir at ingen elementer er valgt.

trans-unit.source: The property was set to a value greater than the number of items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control or less than <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen er satt til en verdi større enn antallet elementer i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen eller mindre enn <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains the zero-based indexes of all currently selected items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling som inneholder de nullbaserte indeksene i alle valgte elementer i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedIndices property is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> class to return a collection that contains the zero-based indexes of all currently selected items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SelectedIndices brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>klassen for å returnere en samling som inneholder de nullbaserte indeksene i alle for øyeblikket er valgt elementer i den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: Control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> class can override the SelectedIndices property to provide a custom algorithm for returning currently selected items.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer utviklere utvide funksjonaliteten til de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>klassen kan overstyre egenskapen SelectedIndices for å angi en egendefinert algoritme for returnerer for øyeblikket er valgt elementer.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the zero-based indexes of all currently selected items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En samling som inneholder de nullbaserte indeksene i alle for øyeblikket er valgt elementer i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the selected items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control change between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når de valgte elementene i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen endring mellom legges til serveren.

trans-unit.source: The ServerChange event is raised when the selected items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control change between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: ServerChange denne hendelsen oppstår når de valgte elementene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollen endring mellom legges til serveren.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The control must have view state enabled for the ServerChange event to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Kontrollen må ha visningsstatus aktivert for hendelsen ServerChange skal fungere riktig.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height (in rows) of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir høyden på (i rader) for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the Size property to specify the height (in rows) of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk størrelse-egenskapen til å angi høyde (i rader) for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: If you specify a size that is smaller than the number of items in the control, scroll bars are displayed to allow you to move up and down the list.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir en størrelse som er mindre enn antallet elementer i kontrollen, vises rullefeltet stolper slik at du kan gå opp eller ned listen.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control is displayed as a drop-down list box.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollen skal vises som en rullegardinliste.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>

trans-unit.source: If you allow multiple selections (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the Size property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du tillater flere valg (ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>egenskapen `true`), eller angi en høyde som er større enn én rad (ved å sette egenskapen til en verdi større enn `1`), kontrollen skal vises som en liste.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>

trans-unit.source: The height (in rows) of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Høyde (i rader) for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.target: Samlingen av alle navneverdier som innkommende.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollens tilstanden er endret som et resultat av en tilbakesending; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Tracks view state changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control so the changes can be stored in the control's <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Sporer vise status endringer i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollere slik at endringene kan lagres i kontrollens <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This object is accessible through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er tilgjengelig via den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The TrackViewState method persists items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to view state.
trans-unit.target: Metoden TrackViewState vedvarer elementer i den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>samling av <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>kontrollen for å vise tilstand.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control or sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex*> property of the control to the index of the first item in the list with the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien for det valgte elementet i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen eller angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex*>kontrollen i indeksen for det første elementet i listen med den angitte verdien.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The Value property is commonly used to get the value of the item referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Value brukes vanligvis til å hente verdien for elementet som refererer til den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If no item is selected in the control, <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> is returned.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis ingen elementer er valgt i kontrollen, <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>returneres.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to a value, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property is updated with the index of the first item in the list that contains that value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter denne egenskapen til en verdi av <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>egenskapen oppdateres med indeksen for det første elementet i listen som inneholder denne verdien.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no matching value is found, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property is left unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes ingen samsvarende verdi, i <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>er venstre uendret.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for det valgte elementet i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If no item is selected in the control, <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen elementer er valgt i kontrollen, <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> returneres.

trans-unit.source: The Value property was set to an item greater than the number of items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"></xref> control or less than <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Value er satt til et element som er større enn antallet elementer i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect"> </xref> kontrollen eller mindre enn <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""> </xref>.
